en: The promise to Abraham continues through the next generations.
Through Isaac and Jacob, the story moves toward Egypt.

lines: Abraham was the father of Isaac.
Isaac was the father of Jacob.
Jacob became the forefather of Moses.
God spoke to Israel in a vision at night and said,
“I am God, the God of your father,” he said.
“Do not be afraid to go down to Egypt,
for I will make you into a great nation there.”

question.en: What do you notice about how God continues His promise across generations and locations?
